title: Celestial Magnet
summaries: The Celestial Magnet is an accessory that greatly increases the pickup range for Stars. The increase in pickup range is 18.75 tiles, extending the base range of 2.625 tiles to 21.375 tiles. This effect does not stack with that of any of the Celestial Magnet's upgrades.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Celestial Magnet has a 1/4 (25%) of being found inside Skyware Chests on Floating Islands, as well as a 1/4 (25%) chance of being obtained from Sky Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Azure Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, it is instead purchased exclusively from the Traveling Merchant for 15 GC.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases pickup range for mana stars
statistics.Buy: 15 GC (Old-gen console version)
statistics.Sell: 3 GC
